articles.title: Duncan Wanblad named new Anglo American CEO as Cutifani to step down after 9 years at the helm - News24
articles.description: Anglo American has appointed Duncan Wanblad to lead the company after Mark Cutifani's retirement in 2022.
articles.content:
Anglo American has appointed Duncan Wanblad as its new CEO, replacing Mark Cutifani who is retiring next year after nine years in the role, the mining conglomerate announced on Wednesday.

articles.title: Michelle Wu is Boston's first female and first person of color elected mayor - NPR
articles.description: Wu's parents immigrated to the U.S. from Taiwan. She defeated fellow Democratic City Councilor Annissa Essaibi George, a self-described first-generation Arab-Polish American.
articles.content:
Michelle Wu speaks after voting in Boston on Tuesday.
Allison Dinner/Getty Images

articles.title: Samsung leads Apple in smartphone shipments in North America - iMore
articles.description: According to new data from Strategy Analytics, Samsung is leading Apple in smartphone shipments in the third quarter of 2021.
articles.content:
Apple is still trying to beat out Samsung for the top spot in North America.

articles.title: Lost Ark Expands to 34 Additional Countries, With New Server and Localization Plans - MMORPG.com
articles.description: Lost Ark's closed beta is fast approaching. The initial intent was to bring the game to North America and Europe but other regions have now been added, bringing an additional 34 new countries  to the list for closed beta and launch.
